name: Platformer (by Om Gupta)
description:
"This is my platformer. It's a fun game and I hope you like it. 

Use the arrow keys to move. Pick up coins and avoid enemies. You can also shoot enemies with the spacebar. It doesn't have an ending, but I am working on it. 

I hope you like what I have so far. You can start playing now!"

 - Om Gupta

This game was created by Om Gupta while he was doing a Godot game development camp at Code Wiz.
